snippet: A clunky Gingrich machine is campaigning in a state where Mitt Romney has been building a well-oiled one since 2008.
abstract: Newt Gingrich seeks to remain a factor, not an also-ran, in the Republican presidential race; noted is the unusual level of disarray within the Gingrich team as it has moved camp from Florida, after a shellacking in the primary, to Nevada.
lead_paragraph: A clunky Gingrich machine is campaigning in a state where Mitt Romney has been building a well-oiled one since 2008.

headline.seo: Gingrich Off to a Bumpy Start in Nevada
headline.main: Gears Grind as Gingrich Shifts to Nevada
headline.print_headline: Gears Grind as Gingrich Shifts to Nevada
